sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; const HomePage = () => { const [featuredProducts, setFeaturedProducts] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { // In a real app, you would fetch featured products from the API // For now, let's simulate it const fetchFeaturedProducts = async () => { try { // const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/products?featured=true'); // setFeaturedProducts(response.data); // Mock data for now setFeaturedProducts([ { _id: '1', name: 'Herbal Shampoo', description: 'Natural ayurvedic shampoo for hair growth with herbs and oils.', price: 1200.50, imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1608571423902-eed4a5ad8108?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', category: 'Hair Care' }, { _id: '2', name: 'Ayurvedic Face Cream', description: 'Rejuvenating face cream made with natural ingredients.', price: 1500.00, imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1601049676869-702ea24cfd58?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', category: 'Skin Care' }, { _id: '3', name: 'Digestive Herbal Tea', description: 'Soothing herbal tea to aid digestion and gut health.', price: 850.00, imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1564890369478-c89ca6d9cde9?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', category: 'Digestive Health' }, { _id: '4', name: 'Immunity Booster', description: 'Natural supplement to strengthen your immune system.', price: 2100.00, imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1471864190281-a93a3070b6de?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', category: 'Immunity Boosters' } ]); setLoading(false); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching featured products:', error); setLoading(false); } }; fetchFeaturedProducts(); }, []); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Authentic Ayurvedic Products for Your Wellbeing

Discover the ancient healing wisdom of Ayurveda through our premium quality products sourced directly from trusted suppliers.

Explore Products Register Now
{/* Categories Section */}

Our Product Categories

{['Hair Care', 'Skin Care', 'Digestive Health', 'Immunity Boosters'].map((category) => (
{category[0]}

{category}

Explore our {category.toLowerCase()} products

))}
{/* Featured Products */}

Featured Products

{loading ? (

Loading products...

) : (
{featuredProducts.map((product) => (

{product.name}

{product.description}

Rs. {product.price.toFixed(2)} {product.category}
))}
)}
View All Products
{/* Benefits Section */}

Why Choose Ayurvedic Products?

Natural Ingredients

Our products are made from 100% natural ingredients, free from harmful chemicals and artificial additives.

Traditional Wisdom

Formulations based on ancient Ayurvedic principles passed down through generations.

Holistic Well-being

Products designed to promote overall health and balance in body, mind, and spirit.

{/* Testimonials */}

What Our Customers Say

{[ { name: "Priya Sharma", quote: "The Ayurvedic hair oil has completely transformed my hair. It's stronger and shinier than ever before!", avatar: "https://randomuser.me/api/portraits/women/54.jpg" }, { name: "Amal Perera", quote: "I've been using the digestive herbal tea for a month now and my digestive issues have significantly improved.", avatar: "https://randomuser.me/api/portraits/men/32.jpg" }, { name: "Lakshmi Devi", quote: "The face cream is amazing. My skin feels rejuvenated and the natural ingredients make it perfect for daily use.", avatar: "https://randomuser.me/api/portraits/women/67.jpg" } ].map((testimonial, index) => (

{testimonial.name}

"{testimonial.quote}"

{[...Array(5)].map((_, i) => ( ))}
))}
); }; export default HomePage;
